com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.widget

Class VGSCardNumberEditText

  • InputFieldView
    • com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.widget.VGSCardNumberEditText

  • public class VGSCardNumberEditText
extends InputFieldView

    A user interface element that displays text to the user in card number format.
